thread.title: Ukraine conflict: UN warns of dangerous deterioration
thread.title_full: Ukraine conflict: UN warns of dangerous deterioration

title: Ukraine conflict: UN warns of dangerous deterioration
text: Ukraine conflict: UN warns of dangerous deterioration â€¢ Ukraine conflict: UN warns of dangerous deterioration More The UN Security Council has warned of a "dangerous deterioration" in eastern Ukraine and called on warring sides to halt the violence. The council said renewed fighting was having a "severe impact" on civilians. Fighting in the frontline town of Avdiivka has left thousands of residents without water or power in freezing conditions. Ukraine says it is preparing a possible evacuation of the town to avoid a humanitarian crisis. Each side blames the other for the upsurge in violence. "The members of the Security Council called for an immediate return to a ceasefire regime," the Ukrainian-drafted statement said. The text did not raise objections from Russia, a permanent member of the council, which
